search_engine.indexer

Class DocumentList

  • java.lang.Object
    • search_engine.indexer.DocumentList

  •  class DocumentList
extends Object
    Singleton class

    * This class provides the implementation of DocumentList
    A DocumentList is a list of documentName, each is then assigned a docId upon adding
    The docId is simply the index of the documentName in the list

    Note: The DocumentList needs to be close () when done to save all the changes into files
    Author:
    ngtrhieu0011

      • start

        public void start()
           throws IOException
        Initialise the DocumentList
        Fetch the document list from the disk if the document list does not exist
        Throws:
        IOException - when the file cannot be opened

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close the DocumentList
        Throws:
        IOException - when the file cannot be opened

      • addDocument

        public int addDocument(String docName)
        Add a document into the documentList and return its docId
        If the document has been already added, it will not be added again
        Parameters:
        docName -
        Returns:
        docId of the added document, -1 if the docName is not found, or the DictionaryList hasn't been initialised/has been closed

      • getDocId

        public int getDocId(String docName)
        Return the docId of a document based on its name
        Parameters:
        docName -
        Returns:
        docId of the document, or -1 is the document is not found, or the DictionaryList hasn't been initialised/has been closed

      • getDocName

        public String getDocName(int docId)
        Return the docName of a document based on its docId
        Parameters:
        docId -
        Returns:
        docName of the document, null if the document is not found

                        throws IOException

        IOEcxeption - when the file cannot be opened

                  throws IOException
        Update the local Document List to file
        Throws:
